meta.name: description
meta.content:
Mission Statement
The Jasper County School District will provide the education, environment, and encouragement that will develop and prepare all students to be college and career ready.

Vision Statement
Jasper County School District aspires for all students to excel to the highest academic and social standards possible in order to be successful global citizens.

figcaption.p: Across JCSD, teachers use innovative tools like "Achieve 3000" and "ALEKS Math" to prepare our students for their future.
Watch as Ms. Molly Binder, fifth grade teacher at Hardeeville Elementary School, explains how she uses these state-of-the-art tools in her classroom.
STEM-U and JCSD has teamed up to provide our students world class opportunities!

February 7, 2020 we officially opened an Aerospace & Aviation Lab at Ridgeland-Hardeeville High School. This lab will propel our kids into a future in the growing Aerospace industry. Click the photo to see the Ceremony!
Nominate a JCSD former staff member or former student for the Wall of Honor. Click the Photo for more info!

Hardeeville Elementary School held its' Black History Month program February 28th. We were treated to songs of joy, a fashion show that showed off styles from around the world, drum/dance routines, lots of black history facts and a step show! Way to go young-learners! Click the Photo for more pics

img.alt: New Staff Assignments & New Hires Announcement

div.div: JCSD: “Student-Centered..Future-Focused” New District and School Level Instructional Leadership: Supporting Teaching and Learning for Accountable Instructional Delivery and Improved Student Outcomes

h3.a: JASPER COUNTY SCHOOL BOARD MEETING LIVE-STREAMING

div.div:
The Jasper County School District Board of Trustees will hold a regularly scheduled meeting on Tuesday, April 21, 2020.
The board meeting will be virtually conducted via Facebook Live. Therefore, the Board of Trustees will not meet at a physical location during this unprecedented time to ensure the safety of all.

h3.a: JASPER COUNTY SCHOOL BOARD MEETING LIVE-STREAMING

div.div:
The Jasper County School District Board of Trustees will hold a regularly scheduled meeting on Monday, April 6, 2020.
The board meeting will be virtually conducted via Skype. Therefore, the Board of Trustees will not meet at a physical location during this unprecedented time to ensure the safety of all.
5:30pm Executive Session (Closed to the public) 6:30pm Public Session (Will be Broadcast Live via SKYPE)
Click the Agenda for more information

h3.a: Memo for Parents and Students (COVID-19 Grading Guidance)

div.div: To accommodate the flexibility granted by the USED (United States Education Department), final grade calculations have been revised.

h3.a: IMPORTANT UPDATE to Grab -n- Go Feeding Initiative

div.div: Beginning Monday, March 30, 2020, breakfast and lunch will be delivered for anyone 18 years of age and under, at the approved sites, Monday thru Thursday.

h3.a: March 27th Memo to Students and Families

div.div: General update from Dr. Rechel Anderson, Superintendent.
Jasper County School District aspires for all students to excel to the highest academic and social standards possible in order to be successful global citizens.

Jasper County School District is committed to ensuring our websites are accessible to everyone. If you experience difficulty with accessibility on any web pages or documents, please request the materials in an alternate format by contacting us: travis.washington@jcsd.net | (843) 489-8892 ext. 1600
